current_task: SITE STILL DOWN - Your fix did not work
message: THE SITE IS STILL DOWN. I just tested and it's NOT working. DNS returns nothing. Connection to 192.168.2.67:3000 times out. Please actually verify the fix worked before marking resolved.
required_actions: 4. If tunnel not running: podman start interchord-tunnel
